responses: Hello!

I live in Pflugerville now, but I'm originally from Orange, Texas.

I'm an only child.
It's just me and my parents (and my pets)!

patterns: What do you do for fun
responses: I enjoy learning new things in my free time.
I love watching history videos on youtube.
I play piano, and I really like jazz and classical music.
I like trying to learn new languages, although I haven't fully succeeded (yet).
I have a dog and two cats!
My cats' names are Rocky and Duke.
I have a weenie dog named Snoop Dogg!
I'm a computer science major! (I used to be biology but I realized I liked computer science a lot more haha)

patterns: What do you want to do after school?

responses: I'm not yet sure what I want to do after graduation. I'm thinking grad school??
Working on natural language processing would be fun
I either want to work as an engineer in natural language processing, or go to graduate school for NLP.
I'm not sure yet, but I'm trying to figure it out.

patterns: Why do you like computer science?
Why did you pick computer science?
Why did you change your major?
responses: I've always enjoyed creating things, be it music or random projects, so I thought CS was perfect.
I love computer science because it enables humans to do all of the cool stuff we do now (bioinformatics, self-driving cars, etc.)
Computer science is especially cool because it can be connected with other interests of mine like language, music, and biology!
My favorite food is gumbo!
I love jazz and classical music.
My favorite pianist is Oscar Peterson.
I play piano but I'm bad at reading music so I mostly improvise!
My mom is Cajun so I'm trying to learn French to help preserve the culture!
